alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL VICTORIA...GOLIAD AND EAST CENTRAL BEE COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 701 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ander to 6 miles northeast of Berclair. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Fannin, Schroeder, Ander, Berclair, Weesatche, and Weser. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 626 and 650. US Highway 59 between mile markers 654 and 688. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
